verses.name: Psalms 70:1
verses.text: Make haste, O God, to deliver me; make haste to help me, O Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 70:2
verses.text: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul: let them be turned backward, and put to confusion, that desire my hurt.

verses.name: Psalms 70:3
verses.text: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say, Aha, aha.

verses.name: Psalms 70:4
verses.text: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.
